abstract: Harold Reiter explores dots that fuse - and deepens our basic understanding of how we count.
snippet: Harold Reiter explores dots that fuse - and deepens our basic understanding of how we count.
lead_paragraph: You'll never count the same after this week's adventure, brought to us by Harold Reiter from the University of North Carolina at Charlotte. I met Professor Reiter at a Math Circle event over the summer and found him overflowing with curiosity and enthusiasm about anything math-related - including a number of terrific math puzzles. Fusing Dots is one of his favorites.
